title: Confined phase transition triggering a high-performance energy storage thermo-battery
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01435A, Paper
Jing Li, Shiyan Chen, Xiangyang Qu, Zhiliang Han, Zhou Zhou, Lili Deng, Yuhang Jia, Shengming Zhang, Ruimin Xie, Huaping Wang
An energy storage thermo-battery from a thermocell was obtained by utilizing the thermo-responsive hydrophobic interaction between methyl cellulose and I3− (ΔC), and the thermoelectric properties were further enhanced by the confinement of BC (ΔS).
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
